content: The "Law Enforcement Officers Safety Act Improvements Act of 2010" amends Section 926B of title 18, United States Code to include law enforcement officers of the Amtrak Police Department, Federal Reserve, and executive branch of the Federal Government as authorized employees for law enforcement purposes. The "Law Enforcement Officers Safety Act Improvements Act of 2010" expands the definition of 'firearm' in Section 926B of title 18, United States Code to include ammunition not prohibited by Federal law or the National Firearms Act. It excludes machineguns, firearm silencers, and destructive devices.
